actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

short_title: National Intersection and Interchange Safety Construction Program Act of 2021
titles: National Intersection and Interchange Safety Construction Program Act of 2021
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to establish a national intersection and interchange safety construction program, and for other purposes.
titles_whole_bill: National Intersection and Interchange Safety Construction Program Act of 2021
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to establish a national intersection and interchange safety construction program, and for other purposes.
